TEXT: A portal to unspeakable horrors was summoned. NL This little girl has dark secrets you don't want to find out.
NL You speak dark hexes in the old tongue...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several ThorW's basement dwellers in the midst of some lolicon ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Abby,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~Yog~ ~Sothoth."~
